channel.title: v2ray on Kip Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in v2ray on Kip Jiang

item.title: Working With Ubuntu (1)
item.description: 如何在 Ubuntu 中安装一些开发软件。 v2ray 下载并安装 v2ray 脚本 v2ray-core/release 下载最新版的 v2ray Linux 压缩包，并通过脚本在本地安装 $ curl https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases/download/v4.22.1/v2ray-linux-64.zip $ curl -L -s https://install.direct/go.sh -o go.sh $ sudo su # bash go.sh --local ./v2ray-linux-64.zip 配置 Server 首先，你得有一台在境外的 VPS …… 配置 Client 编辑配置文件： # vim /etc/v2ray/config.json 按如下示例配置： { "inbounds": [{ "port": 1080, "listen": "127.0.0.1", "protocol": "socks", "tag": "socks-inbound", "settings": { "auth": "noauth", "udp": true, "ip": "127.0.0.1" }, "sniffing": { "enbale": true, "destOverride": [ "http", "tls" ] } }], "outbounds": [{ "protocol": "vmess", "settings": { "vnext": [{ "address": "**.
